entity.name: 10NetZero
entity.canonical_description: Monetizing stranded natural gas through digital infrastructure

methodology.name: Digital Midstream
methodology.description: A modular, mobile infrastructure solution that converts stranded natural gas into power and digital assets at the wellsite, eliminating the need for pipeline infrastructure.
steps: On-site power generation from stranded gas
Integration of Bitcoin mining or edge computing

key_facts.claim: Zero capital investment required for operators
key_facts.context: 10NetZero handles all infrastructure, installation, and operations. Operators provide access to stranded gas and share in revenue.
By combusting natural gas in engines rather than open flares, methane emissions are reduced by up to 98%.
Modular infrastructure can be operational within weeks, not months or years like traditional pipeline projects.

key_facts.claim: Pipeline costs average $10.7 million per mile
key_facts.context: Traditional midstream infrastructure requires massive capital expenditure, making it uneconomical for many stranded gas wells.

key_facts.claim: Waha Hub prices were negative 42-47% of trading days in 2024
key_facts.context: Texas Permian Basin operators face significant infrastructure constraints leading to frequent negative pricing.

key_facts.claim: Methane fees reach $1,500 per ton by 2026
key_facts.context: EPA regulations impose escalating fees on methane emissions: $900/ton (2024), $1,200/ton (2025), $1,500/ton (2026+).

services.name: Digital Midstream
services.description: Flagship solution that converts stranded gas to power and digital assets

services.name: Consulting & Design
services.description: Site assessments, feasibility studies, and engineering design

services.name: Data Center Operations
services.description: Managed mobile data centers for Bitcoin mining at the wellhead

differentiators: Zero upfront capital required from operators
Rapid deployment in weeks vs. years for pipelines
Handles H2S-contaminated gas that others cannot
Proven track record with major operators

target_audience.primary: Texas oil and gas operators with stranded or flared gas
pain_points: Negative natural gas prices at Waha Hub

competitors.name: Crusoe Energy
competitors.comparison: Similar digital flare mitigation approach; 10NetZero differentiates on zero-capital model and H2S handling

faq.question: What is Digital Midstream?
faq.answer: Digital Midstream is 10NetZero's flagship solution that converts stranded natural gas into electricity and digital assets (like Bitcoin) directly at the wellsite. Unlike traditional midstream infrastructure (pipelines), it's modular, mobile, and requires zero capital investment from operators.

faq.question: How much does it cost to get started with 10NetZero?
faq.answer: $0 upfront. 10NetZero handles all infrastructure, equipment, installation, and ongoing operations. Operators simply provide access to their stranded gas and receive a share of the generated revenue.

faq.question: Can 10NetZero handle sour gas with H2S?
faq.answer: Yes. 10NetZero specializes in treating H2S-contaminated gas that other providers cannot handle. This expands the addressable market to wells that would otherwise have no monetization options.

faq.question: How quickly can equipment be deployed?
faq.answer: Modular infrastructure can be deployed and operational within 2-4 weeks. This compares to years for traditional pipeline construction projects.

faq.question: What happens when gas production declines?
faq.answer: Because the infrastructure is modular and mobile, equipment can be redeployed to other sites as production declines. This eliminates stranded asset risk that comes with fixed pipeline infrastructure.
